content:
1
Developed Power Apps-based application to streamline the process of collecting the data 
related to SKUs sold by its distributors (~60K), and storing the data on an on-premise 
database
Boating and Fishing Supplies Retailer 
(Development of Distributor Management Application)

DISTRIBUTOR MANAGEMENT APPLICATION BASED ON POWER APPS
SITUATION
▪Client partners with ~60K distributors to retail its products and uses multiple applications/systems such as Rollstream, Excel etc. to manually collect the SKU 
information of the products sold. The process is manual and there was an opportunity to consolidate and store the data in a centralized location.
▪Merilytics partnered with the client to design and build an application to systematically collect and store information while ensuring data integrity by 
applying relevant data validation techniques
▪Developed an application on Power Apps with flexibility to assign multiple roles and privileges (such as Admin/Manager etc.) to track the details 
regarding SKUs sold at each of the store locations
▪Provided functionality to bulk upload Excel files using the template available on the application screen
▪Linked the application to Enterprise Data Warehouse tables on an on-premise database to store the data collected, and set up admin rights and hierarchy 
for approval to ensure data is stored in database from authorized personnel
▪Set up data validation rules to ensure the accuracy of the data collected from the distributors
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪Distributor Management Application helped to streamline data collection/acceptance process from the distributors with an appropriate approval 
hierarchy in place to ensure data integrity
▪The application enabled Category Managers to track the requests raised by the distributors with the convenience of using a single platform
▪Automated process of storing data and validation enhanced the data consistency and integrity in the Enterprise Data Warehouse
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a leading omni-channel boating and fishing supply retailer in the U.S. with over 250 stores across the country
2

3
APPLICATION SCREENSHOTS (LOGIN AND SKU SCREEN)
ILLUSTRATIVE
Login screen with functionality for distributor 
registration and password reset.
Access to edit and modify data within a screen 
is defined by the access privileges

4
APPLICATION SCREENSHOTS (BULK UPLOAD AND CATEGORY MANAGER SCREEN)
Functionality to bulk upload of Excel files to 
reduce manual effort to submit the data
Functionality for the Category Manager to review 
the inputs and take action on uploaded 
information.
Distributor will also be able to view the reason for 
rejection, if applicable and can re-upload the 
information accordingly.
